name: branch-warnings
description: Warn when you're on the wrong Git branch, like MASTER

branchwarnings.suppressPopup.description: Suppress the more intrusive warning dialog when first switching to a protected branch (only show the warning on the status bar).

branchwarnings.protectedBranches.description: Array of names of protected branches to show warnings for.

branchwarnings.msgColor.description: Allows you to change the warning msg color.

branchwarnings.msgTooltip.default: This branch has been marked as protected in the branch-warnings extension
branchwarnings.msgTooltip.description: Allows you to change the warning msg tooltip.

branchwarnings.warningText.description: Allows you to change the warning status bar message.

branchwarnings.warningPopup.default: WARNING: you are on the protected branch
branchwarnings.warningPopup.description: Allows you to change the warning popup message.
